mapper.insert:
replace into after_sale_order (platform_order_sn, platform_order_goods_sn, after_sale_reason, outer_id, shop_name, goods_name, sku_name, platform_goods_id, platform_goods_name, style_value, after_sales_type, after_sales_status, goods_number, refund_amount, refund_time, refund_created_time, refund_id ,order_sn,order_goods_id,refund_updated_time) VALUES
(#{order.platformOrderSn}, #{order.platformOrderGoodsSn}, #{order.afterSaleReason}, #{order.outerId}, #{order.shopName}, #{order.goodsName}, #{order.skuName}, #{order.platformGoodsId}, #{order.platformGoodsName}, #{order.styleValue}, #{order.afterSalesType}, #{order.afterSalesStatus}, #{order.goodsNumber}, #{order.refundAmount}, #{order.refundTime}, #{order.refundCreatedTime}, #{order.refundId},#{order.orderSn},#{order.orderGoodsId},#{order.refundUpdatedTime})
